channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Flemish Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Flemish Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie: 26–36 seats
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams: 12–19 seats
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten: 14–24 seats
  • Socialistische Partij Anders: 13–20 seats
  • Groen: 5–11 seats
  • Vlaams Belang: 30–41 seats
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België: 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Dedicated for Soirmag, 28 August–1 September 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Nieuw-Vlaamse Alliantie: 20.0–26.8%
  • Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams: 10.6–16.0%
  • Open Vlaamse Liberalen en Democraten: 11.8–17.4%
  • Socialistische Partij Anders: 10.6–16.0%
  • Groen: 5.4–9.6%
  • Vlaams Belang: 23.5–30.6%
  • Partij van de Arbeid van België: 1.0–3.3%
